code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{Link}from'react-scroll';import'./DropdownMenu.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DropdownMenu=()=>{const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const dropdownRef=useRef(null);const toggleMenu=()=>{setIsOpen(!isOpen);};const handleClickOutside=event=>{if(dropdownRef.current&&!dropdownRef.current.contains(event.target)){setIsOpen(false);}};useEffect(()=>{document.addEventListener('mousedown',handleClickOutside);return()=>{document.removeEventListener('mousedown',handleClickOutside);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dropdown",ref:dropdownRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dropdown-toggle",onClick:toggleMenu,"aria-haspopup":"true","aria-expanded":isOpen,children:"Men\xFA"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:`dropdown-menu ${isOpen?'show':''}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"personal-info",smooth:true,duration:500,onClick:toggleMenu,children:"Informaci\xF3n Personal"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"technologies",smooth:true,duration:500,onClick:toggleMenu,children:"Tecnolog\xEDas"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"projects",smooth:true,duration:500,onClick:toggleMenu,children:"Proyectos"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"contact",smooth:true,duration:500,onClick:toggleMenu,children:"Contacto"})})]})]});};export default DropdownMenu;
